question: I have pain, stiffness and tenderness in both legs particularly from the thigh to the knee.  The tenderness is most acute in the calf.  I am 52 and going thru the menopause so also have night sweats.  My doctor has told me its "my age" & no tests have been carried out although my blood was tested recently for diabetes, cholesterol, thyroid & hormone levels which all came back normal & just confirmed i am menopausal.  I am desperate for some diagnosis for my symptoms as they are keeping me awake constantly and I am now suffering from sleep depravation as well & consequently have no energy & look constantly tired & drawn.
title: pain, stiffness and tenderness in legs
